newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Infratil net asset backing NZ$1.224/share.
newsitem.headline: Infratil net asset backing NZ$1.224/share.

text.p: Infrastructure and Utilities NZ Ltd (Infratil) said on Tuesday based on its unaudited management accounts as at December 31 1996, its net asset backing, undiluted for options, was NZ$1.224 per fully paid share.

"This value is calculated after taking into account the company's net income after tax and after deducting a provision for tax on unrealised gains on investments held by Infratil Securities Limited," Infratil said in a statement.
